questions.question: What is the size of the timestamps in case of vector logical clocks?

explanations.a: Incorrect. Expression evaluates to n<sup>2</sup>. Vector is of length n.
explanations.b: Incorrect. Expression evaluates to 2<sup>n</sup>. Vector is of length n.
explanations.d: Incorrect. Vector is of length n.

questions.question: Vector logical clocks can be used to

answers.c: Can be used along with arbitrary tiebreaks to establish partial ordering
answers.d: Can be used to establish causal ordering

explanations.a: Incorrect. It is possible for two events to have no causal connection to the other. Ordering is indeterminate in this case
explanations.b: Incorrect. It is possible for concurrent events to be ordered by another metric to establish total order
explanations.c: Incorrect. Concurrent events may be arbitrarily ordered for a total ordering
explanations.d: Correct. Vector clocks establish ordering between causally connected events
